column4: While playing MP3 files all other computer generated sounds are blocked. For example I can not here instant messenger notification, they are acutally buffered and when I stop the mp3 playback they come blasting out of my speakers one by one. Another example is playing mp3 files while browsing sound enabled flash websites. I dont here the flash sound effects.

you might want to look into dmix
